email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have a firm offer for the shipment of 50,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai. The details are as follows:

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 50,000 MT
Load Port: Newcastle
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 25/MT
Laycan: 25-30 Oct 2023

This offer is valid for 24 hours. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
John Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for the offer. USD 25/MT seems a bit high. Can you come down to USD 22/MT? Also, could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Laura Jones
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for your response. I can offer USD 23/MT. The vessel, MV OCEAN BREEZE, has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 250m. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
John,

USD 23/MT is still a bit steep. Can we push the laycan to 01-05 Nov? If so, I can agree to USD 21/MT.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Extending the laycan to 01-05 Nov works for us. I can agree to USD 21.50/MT with this revised laycan. That's the best I can do.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
John,

USD 21.50/MT is acceptable. Please send over the recap.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Great! Recap attached. Thanks for the business!

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 50,000 MT
Load Port: Newcastle
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 21.50/MT
Laycan: 01-05 Nov 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
John
